definition: to astonish people (with a miraculous feat)
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: You don’t get to 600 million friends without doing something spectacular.
sentences.chinese: 要沒有什麼驚人之舉，你是得不到6億好友的。

sentences.english: He is a man who always does something that astonishes others.
sentences.chinese: 他是個常會做出驚人之舉的人。

sentences.english: Eg He is a man who always does something that astonishes others.
sentences.chinese: 他是個常會做出驚人之舉的人。

sentences.english: No one had prior knowledge of her stunt on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人事先知道她在舞臺上有那樣的驚人之舉。

sentences.english: So, God had done something terrific.
sentences.chinese: 上帝成就了件驚人之舉。
